intro: Tolmiea, commonly known as the "silver plant," is a genus of flowering plants native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Aizoaceae, which is also known as the ice plant family. Tolmiea species typically thrive in rocky, well-drained soils and are adapted to arid or semi-arid environments. They produce small, star-shaped flowers that are often pale pink or white.
